thread.section_title: DialAFlight Reviews | Read Customer Service Reviews of www.dialaflight.com
thread.title: Lynne Thomas

author: Lynne Thomas
title: Lynne Thomas
text: Charlie and Wayne are always very helpful, always happy to talk about alternative options and especially when there was an issue over delayed luggage for my son. They are happy to talk things through and provide extra service when required. I have recommended them to a friend who is current travelling through Thailand, New Zealand and Australia with their help. Thank you Lynne Thomas
